summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc. It includes various charges for shipping and handling, along with details of the shipments made during September and October 2000.

keyFacts: The invoice details transportation charges amounting to USD $1,386.73 for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc.
Multiple associates of J Epstein are mentioned in relation to shipments, indicating a network of individuals involved in the business.
The invoice includes various charges for special handling and transportation over several dates in September and October 2000.
